- pointer "1.1.1.p78": markdown "– На этом заседание объявляю закрытым."
- "1.1.1.p79": "После чего встал и тоже пошёл домой."

We need to check if any paragraph mentions a person. "На этом заседание объявляю закрытым." That's likely a speaker closing a meeting, doesn't mention a character name. No person name. "После чего встал и тоже пошёл домой." It says someone stood up and went home, but no name. So no character mention. Heading is not a paragraph, ignore.

Thus no new evidence. batchFound false. action? Since there are more batches, and we haven't found enough evidence, continue. needMoreContext false (we can continue). progress can be empty.

We must ensure not to include evidence pointers already in recentEvidencePointers, but we have none.
